email.description: A valid e-mail address assigned to this stop

address2.description: The route Address Line 2 which is not used for geocoding

city.description: The city the address is located in

state.description: The state the address is located in

country.description: The country the address is located in

zip.description: The zip code the address is located in

phone.description: The phone number for the address

first_name.description: The first name of the receiving address

last_name.description: Th last name of the receiving party

account_no.description: The account number for the address

order_no.description: The order number for the address

sequence_no.description: The sequence number for the address

original_route_id.description: The route ID of the address

customer_po.description: The customer purchase order for the address

reference_no.description: The reference number for the address

invoice_no.description: The invoice number for the address

cost.description: The cost of the order for the address

revenue.description: The total revenue for the address

cube.description: The cubic volume of the cargo being delivered/picked up at the address

weight.description: The numeric weight that is being delivered/picked up at this stop

time.description: The expected amount of time the driver will be at the stop (integer minutes or HH:MM:SS)

time_window_start.description: The requested estimated beginning of the time windows (integer minutes or HH:MM:SS)

time_window_end.description: The requested estimated end of the time windows (integer minutes or HH:MM:SS)

is_depot.description: The destination is a depot (0 or 1)

address_stop_type.description: The type of stop that this is (DELIVERY,PICKUP,BREAK,MEETUP,SERVICE,VISIT,DRIVEBY)

route_name.description: Applies to depots: a text that is included in the names of generated routes that involve the depot
